slide0.title: A Quick Primer
slide0.body: Before we begin, let's take a moment to familiarize ourselves with the course interface. If you've completed previous courses, feel free to use the 'Skip Tutorial' button below.

slide1.title: Course Interface
slide1.body: Select the 'Open Help' button below to explore the interface.

slide2.title: Resources
slide2.alt: Stylized illustration of a web page.
slide2.body: As mentioned on the previous slide. Resources to websites and documents can be viewed by selecting 'Resources' in course navigation. Select 'Resources' now to view them.

slide3.title: Course Settings
slide3.alt: Graphical representation of auto play button.
slide3.body: You can set the course audio to auto-play or turn on captions below. To stop auto-play or turn off captions, open the 'menu' and go to 'course settings'.

slide4.title: Requirements
slide4.alt: Graphical representation viewing all pages in the course.
slide4.body: An important reminder. You must view all pages and attempt each knowledge check before the course can be marked as complete.

slide5.title: You're All Set
slide5.alt: Stylized illustration of a gold medal.
slide5.body: You have everything you need to begin the course. Select the 'Start' button in the lower right to begin.
